Package kleingarten.plot

Class PlotControllerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • kleingarten.plot.PlotControllerService
  • @Component
public class PlotControllerService
extends Object
    Service class which contains methods to get the needed information of Plots and access rights to them which are used in the controller classes

      • setPlotColor

        Map<Plot,​String> setPlotColor​(Plot plot,
                                    Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> user)
        Select color of a Plot when a user is logged in and save the selection in a Map of Plot and String
        Parameters:
        plot - Plot for which a color should be selected
        user - as UserAccount
        Returns:
        color of Plot saved in a ModelAndView

      • setAccessRightForPlot

        Map<Plot,​Boolean> setAccessRightForPlot​(Plot plot,
                                              Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> user)
        Select if the details page of a specific Plot can be accessed depending on if a user is logged in or not
        Parameters:
        plot - Plot for which the access to the details page should be set
        user - Optional of type UserAccount of the logged in user
        Returns:
        access rights saved in a Map with the Plot and the access right as Boolean

        plot - Plot to which the information is added

                                        Tenant tenant,
                                        org.springframework.ui.Model mav)
        Select which information a user can see and modify on the details page of a Plot when he is logged in
        Parameters:
        procedure - Optional of Procedure for the Plot which details should be shown
        tenant - Tenant associated to the logged in UserAccount
        mav - Model to save the access rights to the information of the Plot

        Parameters:

      • saveChairmanForPlots

                          List<org.salespointframework.catalog.ProductIdentifier> changedPlots)
        Get all Plots which chairman was modified
        Parameters:
        tenant - Tenant who has the Role "Obmann" and should be the new chairman of the Plot
